name: Spider-Man (2001)
description: The classic action-adventure based on the Marvel character, featuring various suits and iconic villains.

name: Spider-Man 2 (2004)
description: Based on the hit film, this title features web-slinging action through the streets of New York.

name: Ultimate Spider-Man (2005)
description: A cel-shaded open-world adventure based on the Ultimate Marvel comic book series, allowing players to play as both Spider-Man and Venom.

name: Spider-Man 3 (2007)
description: Explore a massive New York City and battle villains from the third film, including the introduction of the black suit.

name: Spider-Man: Friend Or Foe (2007)
description: A unique take on the franchise where Spider-Man teams up with famous allies and villains to defeat a new threat.

name: Spider-Man: Web Of Shadows (2008)
description: A dark, choice-driven adventure where an alien invasion threatens New York, featuring fluid air combat.

name: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions (2010)
description: Travel across four distinct universes—Amazing, Noir, 2099, and Ultimate—each with its own unique art style and gameplay.

name: Spider-Man: Edge of Time (2011)
description: A focused narrative experience where Amazing Spider-Man and Spider-Man 2099 must work across time to prevent a catastrophe.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man (2012)
description: An epilogue story to the reboot film, returning to open-world Manhattan with new 'Web Rush' mechanics.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014)
description: The sequel to the 2012 title, featuring a morality system and an expanded cast of Marvel villains.

name: Spider-Man Remastered
description: The critically acclaimed adventure from Insomniac Games, remastered for modern hardware with improved visuals and all DLC.

name: Spider-Man 2
description: The latest chapter in the Insomniac series, featuring both Peter Parker and Miles Morales as they face off against Venom and Kraven.
